title: 3D Rubik's Cube
description: A web-based 3D Rubik's Cube simulator that allows users to interact with a virtual cube. Users can rotate the cube, perform various moves, and even solve it using an integrated solver algorithm. The application provides a realistic 3D experience with smooth animations and intuitive controls.
tech: Solver algorithm (e.g., Kociemba's algorithm) for solving the cube
